name: Musical Memeories
description:
Control the dreams of a pianist by playing the piano and making images appear.

Done for UCF'S GDK 2017 Summer Game Jam.

If playing the WebGL build, press the full screen button twice.

Use a keyboard or the on-screen piano to write out letters, then press enter to submit. If your word matches, a corresponding image will appear. Use the clear button or backspace to clear entry. Two word combinations do not require a space. Have fun =)

Original concept by Louie Zong.
